Field Label: Record ID

Many people have been held in jail or prison for a night or more at some point in their lives. Please think about your immediate family, including parents; brothers; sisters; children; and your current spouse, current romantic partner, or anyone else you have had a child with. Please include step, foster, and adoptive family members. Confidentially and for statistical purposes only, have any members of your immediate family NOT including yourself, ever been held in jail or prison for one night or longer?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes|2, No, none of these family members were ever in prison or jail for one night or longer
